body_html:
Thanks for adding the test! Code looks great now.

As for InterleaveDataset, I think that's a bug (probably my oversight when I added it...): we should be consistent across the various function-taking transformations, so it would be great if you could change it to use _should_unpack_args() as well.
body_text:
Thanks for adding the test! Code looks great now.
As for InterleaveDataset, I think that's a bug (probably my oversight when I added it...): we should be consistent across the various function-taking transformations, so it would be great if you could change it to use _should_unpack_args() as well.
body:
Thanks for adding the test! Code looks great now.

As for `InterleaveDataset`, I think that's a bug (probably my oversight when I added it...): we should be consistent across the various function-taking transformations, so it would be great if you could change it to use `_should_unpack_args()` as well.
